'''''Wonders of the World''''' contains [[Achievements]] related to all aspects of ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

Most of the achievements in this category are hidden and are only shown once the player has completed them. More achievements are added to ''Wonders of the World'' in most versions, and there is no reward for completing the available achievements in the category.
